 **What is a SSD-Accelerated VPS?**
 
 Everybody knows that traditional hard drives (HDD) are a lot slower compared to SSD (solid state drives). However, SSD drives are a lot more expensive than HDD and comes with less space. With our SSD acceleration technology (combined with RAID 10 as well), we accelerate your "hot" data using SSD, while keeping less-accessed files on the HDD. The whole process is seamless and is done automatically, the result is up to 500% faster disk reading speed!!
 With our SSD acceleration technology, you can have near-SSD speed with cheap, HDD-like price.
